name: DataTable
desc: A data table that follows the [Material 2](https://material.io/go/design-data-tables) design specification.

fields.name: columns
fields.desc: The configuration and labels for the columns in the table.

fields.name: sortColumnIndex
fields.desc: The current primary sort key's column.

fields.name: sortAscending
fields.desc: Whether the column mentioned in [sortColumnIndex], if any, is sorted in ascending order.

fields.name: onSelectAll
fields.desc: Invoked when the user selects or unselects every row, using the checkbox in the heading row.

fields.name: decoration
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.decoration} The background and border decoration for the table. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: dataRowColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.dataRowColor} The background color for the data rows.

fields.name: dataRowMinHeight
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.dataRowMinHeight} The minimum height of each row (excluding the row that contains column headings). {@endtemplate}

fields.name: dataRowMaxHeight
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.dataRowMaxHeight} The maximum height of each row (excluding the row that contains column headings). {@endtemplate}

fields.name: dataTextStyle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.dataTextStyle} The text style for data rows. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: headingRowColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.headingRowColor} The background color for the heading row.

fields.name: headingRowHeight
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.headingRowHeight} The height of the heading row. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: headingTextStyle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.headingTextStyle} The text style for the heading row. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: horizontalMargin
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.horizontalMargin} The horizontal margin between the edges of the table and the content in the first and last cells of each row.

fields.name: columnSpacing
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.columnSpacing} The horizontal margin between the contents of each data column. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: showCheckboxColumn
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.showCheckboxColumn} Whether the widget should display checkboxes for selectable rows.

fields.name: rows
fields.desc: The data to show in each row (excluding the row that contains the column headings).

fields.name: dividerThickness
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.dividerThickness} The width of the divider that appears between [TableRow]s.

fields.name: showBottomBorder
fields.desc: Whether a border at the bottom of the table is displayed.

fields.name: checkboxHorizontalMargin
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dataTable.checkboxHorizontalMargin} Horizontal margin around the checkbox, if it is displayed. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: border
fields.desc: The style to use when painting the boundary and interior divisions of the table.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}
